title: Sound On: Impeachment Trial, Sen. Ernst on USMCA
itunes:title: Sound On: Impeachment Trial, Sen. Ernst on USMCA
description:
Panel Guests: Joe Crowley, former New York Congressman and Democratic Caucus Chair and Tyler Deaton, Republican strategist and fundraiser, President of Allegiance Strategies.


Kevin also spoke with Iowa Republican Senator Joni Ernst about USMCA and President Trump’s impeachment trial.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
